news_header: Several companies are set to report earnings on 02/07/2025, with forecasts indicating various increases and decreases in earnings per share compared to the previous year.
news_original_title: Pre-Market Earnings Report for February 7, 2025 :  FTV, CBOE, KIM, AVTR, PAA, PAGP, FLO, NWL, ROAD, ULCC, PRLB, BYRN
news_text: On 02/07/2025, companies like Fortive Corporation, Cboe Global Markets, and Kimco Realty Corporation are expected to report earnings. Fortive's EPS forecast is $1.12, a 14.29% increase from last year. Cboe's is $2.13, up 3.40%. Kimco's forecast is $0.42, a 7.69% increase. Other companies reporting include Avantor, Plains All American Pipeline, and Newell Brands, with varying forecasts and performance against expectations. Overall, many companies show growth potential compared to their industry ratios.
